Yushi Hu

      Yushi Hu

      • Chicago, IL

      Hello! I am a fourth-year undergrad at the University of Chicago, majoring in mathematics, computer science, and economics. I am working with Prof. Karen Livescu and Sam Wiseman at Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago. I'm primarily interested in machine learning, natural language processing, and speech processing.

      Prior to that, I have also done some physics with Dr. Saidur Bakaul at Argonne National Laboratory and Prof. Chuangang Ning at Tsinghua University.

      Research

      Acoustic Span Embeddings for Multilingual Query-by-Example Search
       Yushi Hu, Shane Settle, Karen Livescu
      under review

      Multilingual Jointly Trained Acoustic and Written Word Embeddings
      Yushi Hu, Shane Settle, Karen Livescu
      In Proceedings of INTERSPEECH 2020
      [paper] [code] [bibtex][slides][video]

      Structural Ripples and Nanoscale Bubble Domains in Freestanding Ferroelectric-Dielectric-Ferroelectric Heterostructure
       Saidur R. Bakaul, Yushi Hu, Liliana Stan, Qi Zhang, Amanda K. Petford-Long, Nagarajan Valanoor
      under review

      A Simple Setup to Measure Muon Lifetime and Electron Energy Spectrum of Muon Decay and its Monte Carlo Simulation
      Yushi Hu, Tianye Wang, Yefeng Mei, Zhao Zhang, Chuangang Ning
      In 物理与工程, 2016.05
      [English version preprint]
